message.body: 你好 @jyingwun@zv 欢迎

"Satoshi has been mythologised and if you pull back the curtain, you shatter a lot of people's fantasies" (from: Bitcoin 'creator' backs out of Satoshi coin move 'proof' http://www.bbc.com/news/technology-36213580 )
hm, "John Kasich, last Republican Trump rival, quits race" http://www.bbc.com/news/world-us-canada-36201042
@redacted@zv I saw a few "I made git" on the forum the last days, do they all copy you ? or has a fever begun: "we all work on the same but not together" ?
(or I am misinterpreting now everything in title with git)
I think I saw at least 2 people, I think
+1 -> "Whether I inspired them"
so others don't misunderstand: this is about case: Satoshi
good evening, @flyman@zid
Who is putting the shit with bare hands in there ? -> "it is shit packed into sack" ;-)
@redacted@zv let's forget them, even their names
our time is worth more than thinking about 'em
pink elephants
they are everywhere
it is adilemma
can it be that between your lines I see some knowledge of systems theory ?
well, there is always some things that are common in different (knowledge/profession/...) areas
"magical power to words": especially magical when growing kids use them, I am always so astonished to hear the smallest family member speak
wow

today I heard for the first time the little one say "in my dream". And I thought in retrospect, perhaps the times when he "lied" were true, because he was telling his dreams, but didn't know the word for "dream"
yeah
"do not form pictures in their head": I guess I belong to that part ? just shortly thought how I interact
but I guess it's mostly due to being used to stuff, so one doesn't think/imagine longer
"actually happened" <- take less drugs ;-)
yes, e.g. a simple one everyone should do is: a triangle -> "can you "picture something in your head"?"
I am actually not seeing the triangle at first, but I am drawing in my mind, eyes closed each side, until it makes the triangle
and, I am also moving my eyes, it seems while drawing the sides. my eyes follow the sides of the triangle, though they are closed
no, I think I am drawing them with my eyes
probbaly your mind saves it before you fall asleep and your body knows where you are ?
I'll make an experiment today: before I go to sleep I'll expect something to see in my dream
@redacted@zv: no, I used to collect viruses and so when I was a teen. Each virus had its own floppy disk :-) -> "Is it bad that I'm fascinated by malware platforms?"
day-dreaming comes to mind
sweet dreams :-)

< Chomsky concluded by noting that Sanders "has mobilized a large number of young people, these young people who are saying, 'Look, we’re not going to consent anymore.' And if that turns into a continuing, organized, mobilized force, that could change the country—maybe not for this election, but in the longer term." > http://www.democracynow.org/2016/4/28/noam_chomsky_young_bernie_sanders_supporters

"a Westpac “glitch” allowed Ms Lee access to $4.6 million, part of which she spent on luxury handbags + renting lavish penthouses. The bank inadvertently gave Ms Lee access to an unlimited overdraft account 4 years ago when she was a month off turning 18.", "withdrawals on numerous occasions that totalled $4,653,333.02 - of which $3.3 million was still “outstanding”."  http://www.news.com.au/national/crime/woman-to-appear-in-waverley-local-court-after-46-million-wrongly-transferred-into-account/news-story/e6cc977ee203befa26d2c861de02b404
ZeroNet 0.3.7 rev1284 is available
which question ?
/me doesn't rememnber
help others understand: why would we want that ?
a time-constrained dev would shout back from the corner: use the proxies (and if you don't trust 'em, because you shouldn't, set up your own)
why are you aksing ? you can see this info on github yourself
@nofish is the main dev of ZN
